CustomField.inlineHelpText: In order to be able to classify the customer's risk and make ongoing follow-up, information regarding the purpose of the customer relationship answered in Kjenndinkunde must be filled in on new customers. In the case of ongoing control, actually check delivery against agreed delivery in the assignment agreement, and response from Kjenndinkunde. The assessments shall form a sufficient basis for an opinion on how the customer can be expected to act within the framework of the customer relationship.
CustomField.label: Purpose and nature of the relationship
